markdown.markdown:
Monthly and daily potential evapotranspiration was calculated with the Hargreaves equation with the R package SPEI. Solar radiation was not available in the gridded weather data and therefore omitted in the calculation. Monthly and daily climatic water balance was calculated as the difference between precipitation and potential evapotranspiration.

```{r format-daily-and-monthly-climate-data-sets, eval=FALSE, include = FALSE, internal = FALSE}
location <- paste0(getwd())
source(paste0("../00_helpers/setup.R")) #common libraries and custom functions
source(paste0("../00_helpers/species_and_phases.R"))

raw_daymet_daily_tree <- read.csv(paste0("C:/Users/iostovary/Documents/Data/DAYMET_switzerland/wsl-daymet/daymetDaily_179sites.csv"))
tree_coordinate_individual <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/tree_coordinate_individual.rds"))

daymet_daily_tree <- raw_daymet_daily_tree %>%
  separate(siteId, into=c("COORD_ID", "trash"), sep ="\\.") %>%
  dplyr::select(-trash) %>%
  mutate(COORD_ID = as.integer(COORD_ID)) %>% 
  left_join(tree_coordinate_individual %>% dplyr::select(-X,-Y), by="COORD_ID") %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "var", values_from = "dailyVal") %>%
  dplyr::select(- lat, -lon, -COORD_ID) %>%
  separate(date, c("year","month","day"), remove=FALSE) %>%
  mutate(year= as.numeric(year),
         date = as_date(date),
         DATE_NUMBER = yday(date)) %>%
  rename(tave=tmea) %>% 
  separate(SAMPLE_CODE, into=c("METEO_ID", "SPECIES_SHORT"), remove=FALSE)

saveRDS(daymet_daily_tree, paste0(path_own_data, "/daymet_daily_tree.rds"))

daymet_monthly_tree_avg <- daymet_daily_tree %>%
  group_by(SAMPLE_CODE, year, month) %>%  
  summarise(tmin=mean(tmin),
            tave=mean(tave),
            tmax=mean(tmax),
            prcp=sum(prcp)) %>% 
    #across(c(prcp, tave, tmax, tmin), mean, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup()

saveRDS(daymet_monthly_tree_avg, paste0(path_own_data, "/daymet_monthly_tree_avg.rds"))
```

```{r load-data}
location <- paste0(getwd())
source(paste0("../00_helpers/setup.R")) #common libraries and custom functions
source(paste0("../00_helpers/species_and_phases.R"))

lib_drought <- c(
  "SPEI", # calculating potential evapotranspiration for water availabilty
  "zoo") # date formatting
package_fun(lib_drought, "drought")

sample_data <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/sample_data.rds"))
phenology <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_phenology.rds"))
daymet_monthly_tree_avg <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/daymet_monthly_tree_avg.rds"))
daymet_daily_tree <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/daymet_daily_avg.rds"))
```

```{r drought-indices-monthly}
#Function to create time series for SPEI and SPI
make_ts <- function(ts_input) {
  make_ts <- stats::ts(ts_input, start=c(1950, 1), frequency=12)
}

#Calculating the different inputs and indices
drought_monthly <- 
  daymet_monthly_tree_avg %>%
  left_join(sample_data %>%
               select(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_WGS_x_corrected), by="SAMPLE_CODE") %>%
  group_by(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_WGS_x_corrected) %>%
  mutate(date = paste(year, month, "01", sep = "-")) %>%
  nest() %>%
  #filter(SAMPLE_CODE %like% "ADB_FS") %>% #filter for debugging
  #CALCULATE PET
  mutate(PET_HARG = map(data, ~SPEI::hargreaves(Tmin = .x$tmin, Tmax = .x$tmax, lat=TREE_WGS_x_corrected, Pre = .x$prcp, na.rm = TRUE, verbose=FALSE) %>%
                      as.data.frame() %>% setNames("PET_HARG"))) %>%
  unnest(cols=c(data, PET_HARG)) %>%
  nest() %>%
  #CALCULATE CLIMATIC WATER BALANCE
  mutate(CLIM_WATER_BALANCE1 = map(data, ~.x$prcp-.x$PET_HARG %>% as.data.frame() %>% setNames(c("CLIM_BALANCE1"))),
         CLIM_WATER_BALANCE_TS = map(CLIM_WATER_BALANCE1, ~make_ts(.x$CLIM_BALANCE1))) %>%
  dplyr::select(-CLIM_WATER_BALANCE_TS) %>% 
  unnest(cols=c(data, CLIM_WATER_BALANCE1)) %>%
  mutate(date = paste0(year,".", month, ".", "01"),
         DATE = ymd(date)) %>%
  #CALCULATE ROLLING MEANS
  group_by(SAMPLE_CODE) %>%
  mutate(CLIM_BALANCE3 = zoo::rollmeanr(CLIM_BALANCE1, 3, fill=NA),
         CLIM_BALANCE6 = zoo::rollmeanr(CLIM_BALANCE1, 6, fill=NA),
         CLIM_BALANCE12 = zoo::rollmeanr(CLIM_BALANCE1, 12, fill=NA),
         PET_HARG_ROLL = zoo::rollmeanr(PET_HARG, 36, fill=NA)) %>%
  ungroup()
```

```{r drought-indices-daily}
drought_daily <- 
  daymet_daily_tree %>%
  left_join(sample_data %>%
               select(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_WGS_x_corrected), by="SAMPLE_CODE") %>%
  group_by(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_WGS_x_corrected) %>%
  nest() %>%
  #CALCULATE PET
  mutate(PET_HARG = map(data, ~SPEI::hargreaves(Tmin = .x$tmin, Tmax = .x$tmax, lat=TREE_WGS_x_corrected, Pre = .x$prcp, na.rm = TRUE, verbose=FALSE) %>%
                      as.data.frame() %>% setNames("PET_HARG"))) %>%
  unnest(cols=c(data, PET_HARG)) %>%
  nest() %>%
  #CALCULATE CLIMATIC WATER BALANCE AND SUM OF DAYS
  mutate(CLIM_WATER_BALANCE = map(data, ~.x$prcp-.x$PET_HARG %>% as.data.frame() %>% setNames(c("CLIM_BALANCE"))),
         CLIM_BALANCE_ROLL = map(CLIM_WATER_BALANCE, ~.x %>% mutate(CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM3 = rollsum(CLIM_BALANCE < 0, k = 90, align = "right", fill = NA),
                                                                    CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM6 = rollsum(CLIM_BALANCE < 0, k = 180, align = "right", fill = NA),
                                                                    CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM12 = rollsum(CLIM_BALANCE < 0, k = 365, align = "right", fill = NA)))) %>%
  select(-CLIM_WATER_BALANCE) %>%
  unnest(cols=c(data, CLIM_BALANCE_ROLL)) %>%
  ungroup()
```

```{r fig-correlation-monthly, fig.height=12, warning=FALSE, progress=FALSE, include=TRUE, fig.cap="Correlation between different monthly drought parameters.", internal = TRUE}
pairs_drought_monthly <- drought_monthly %>%
  filter(year > 2020) %>% 
  select(-c(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_WGS_x_corrected, year, month, date, DATE))
                                                    
ggpairs(pairs_drought_monthly, showStrips=TRUE, progress=FALSE)+
  theme_report(angle=90)
```

```{r fig-correlation-daily, fig.height=10, warning=FALSE, progress=FALSE, include=TRUE, fig.cap="Correlation between different daily drought parameters from 2021 to present.", eval=FALSE, internal = TRUE}
pairs_drought_daily <- drought_daily %>%
  filter(year > 2021) %>% # filter to reduce coputation time
  select(-c(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_WGS_x_corrected, date, year, month, day, METEO_ID, SPECIES_SHORT, DATE_NUMBER))

ggpairs(pairs_drought_daily, showStrips=TRUE, progress=FALSE)+
  theme_report(angle=90)
```

```{r save-output}
saveRDS(drought_monthly %>% select(SAMPLE_CODE, year, month, PET_HARG, CLIM_BALANCE1, CLIM_BALANCE3, CLIM_BALANCE6, CLIM_BALANCE12) %>% mutate(month=as.numeric(month)) %>% ungroup(), paste0(path_own_data, "/input_drought.rds"))
saveRDS(drought_daily %>% select(SAMPLE_CODE, year, month, day, date, DATE_NUMBER, contains("CLIM_BALANCE"), -CLIM_BALANCE) %>% ungroup(), paste0(path_own_data, "/input_drought_daily.rds"))
```
markdown.srcMarkdownNoYaml:
# Drought

Monthly and daily potential evapotranspiration was calculated with the Hargreaves equation with the R package SPEI. Solar radiation was not available in the gridded weather data and therefore omitted in the calculation. Monthly and daily climatic water balance was calculated as the difference between precipitation and potential evapotranspiration.

```{r format-daily-and-monthly-climate-data-sets, eval=FALSE, include = FALSE, internal = FALSE}
location <- paste0(getwd())
source(paste0("../00_helpers/setup.R")) #common libraries and custom functions
source(paste0("../00_helpers/species_and_phases.R"))

raw_daymet_daily_tree <- read.csv(paste0("C:/Users/iostovary/Documents/Data/DAYMET_switzerland/wsl-daymet/daymetDaily_179sites.csv"))
tree_coordinate_individual <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/tree_coordinate_individual.rds"))

daymet_daily_tree <- raw_daymet_daily_tree %>%
  separate(siteId, into=c("COORD_ID", "trash"), sep ="\\.") %>%
  dplyr::select(-trash) %>%
  mutate(COORD_ID = as.integer(COORD_ID)) %>% 
  left_join(tree_coordinate_individual %>% dplyr::select(-X,-Y), by="COORD_ID") %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "var", values_from = "dailyVal") %>%
  dplyr::select(- lat, -lon, -COORD_ID) %>%
  separate(date, c("year","month","day"), remove=FALSE) %>%
  mutate(year= as.numeric(year),
         date = as_date(date),
         DATE_NUMBER = yday(date)) %>%
  rename(tave=tmea) %>% 
  separate(SAMPLE_CODE, into=c("METEO_ID", "SPECIES_SHORT"), remove=FALSE)

saveRDS(daymet_daily_tree, paste0(path_own_data, "/daymet_daily_tree.rds"))

daymet_monthly_tree_avg <- daymet_daily_tree %>%
  group_by(SAMPLE_CODE, year, month) %>%  
  summarise(tmin=mean(tmin),
            tave=mean(tave),
            tmax=mean(tmax),
            prcp=sum(prcp)) %>% 
    #across(c(prcp, tave, tmax, tmin), mean, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup()

saveRDS(daymet_monthly_tree_avg, paste0(path_own_data, "/daymet_monthly_tree_avg.rds"))
```

```{r load-data}
location <- paste0(getwd())
source(paste0("../00_helpers/setup.R")) #common libraries and custom functions
source(paste0("../00_helpers/species_and_phases.R"))

lib_drought <- c(
  "SPEI", # calculating potential evapotranspiration for water availabilty
  "zoo") # date formatting
package_fun(lib_drought, "drought")

sample_data <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/sample_data.rds"))
phenology <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/input_phenology.rds"))
daymet_monthly_tree_avg <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/daymet_monthly_tree_avg.rds"))
daymet_daily_tree <- readRDS(paste0(path_own_data, "/daymet_daily_avg.rds"))
```

```{r drought-indices-monthly}
#Function to create time series for SPEI and SPI
make_ts <- function(ts_input) {
  make_ts <- stats::ts(ts_input, start=c(1950, 1), frequency=12)
}

#Calculating the different inputs and indices
drought_monthly <- 
  daymet_monthly_tree_avg %>%
  left_join(sample_data %>%
               select(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_WGS_x_corrected), by="SAMPLE_CODE") %>%
  group_by(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_WGS_x_corrected) %>%
  mutate(date = paste(year, month, "01", sep = "-")) %>%
  nest() %>%
  #filter(SAMPLE_CODE %like% "ADB_FS") %>% #filter for debugging
  #CALCULATE PET
  mutate(PET_HARG = map(data, ~SPEI::hargreaves(Tmin = .x$tmin, Tmax = .x$tmax, lat=TREE_WGS_x_corrected, Pre = .x$prcp, na.rm = TRUE, verbose=FALSE) %>%
                      as.data.frame() %>% setNames("PET_HARG"))) %>%
  unnest(cols=c(data, PET_HARG)) %>%
  nest() %>%
  #CALCULATE CLIMATIC WATER BALANCE
  mutate(CLIM_WATER_BALANCE1 = map(data, ~.x$prcp-.x$PET_HARG %>% as.data.frame() %>% setNames(c("CLIM_BALANCE1"))),
         CLIM_WATER_BALANCE_TS = map(CLIM_WATER_BALANCE1, ~make_ts(.x$CLIM_BALANCE1))) %>%
  dplyr::select(-CLIM_WATER_BALANCE_TS) %>% 
  unnest(cols=c(data, CLIM_WATER_BALANCE1)) %>%
  mutate(date = paste0(year,".", month, ".", "01"),
         DATE = ymd(date)) %>%
  #CALCULATE ROLLING MEANS
  group_by(SAMPLE_CODE) %>%
  mutate(CLIM_BALANCE3 = zoo::rollmeanr(CLIM_BALANCE1, 3, fill=NA),
         CLIM_BALANCE6 = zoo::rollmeanr(CLIM_BALANCE1, 6, fill=NA),
         CLIM_BALANCE12 = zoo::rollmeanr(CLIM_BALANCE1, 12, fill=NA),
         PET_HARG_ROLL = zoo::rollmeanr(PET_HARG, 36, fill=NA)) %>%
  ungroup()
```

```{r drought-indices-daily}
drought_daily <- 
  daymet_daily_tree %>%
  left_join(sample_data %>%
               select(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_WGS_x_corrected), by="SAMPLE_CODE") %>%
  group_by(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_WGS_x_corrected) %>%
  nest() %>%
  #CALCULATE PET
  mutate(PET_HARG = map(data, ~SPEI::hargreaves(Tmin = .x$tmin, Tmax = .x$tmax, lat=TREE_WGS_x_corrected, Pre = .x$prcp, na.rm = TRUE, verbose=FALSE) %>%

  unnest(cols=c(data, PET_HARG)) %>%
  nest() %>%
  #CALCULATE CLIMATIC WATER BALANCE AND SUM OF DAYS

         CLIM_BALANCE_ROLL = map(CLIM_WATER_BALANCE, ~.x %>% mutate(CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM3 = rollsum(CLIM_BALANCE < 0, k = 90, align = "right", fill = NA),
                                                                    CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM6 = rollsum(CLIM_BALANCE < 0, k = 180, align = "right", fill = NA),
                                                                    CLIM_BALANCE_DAYSUM12 = rollsum(CLIM_BALANCE < 0, k = 365, align = "right", fill = NA)))) %>%
  select(-CLIM_WATER_BALANCE) %>%
  unnest(cols=c(data, CLIM_BALANCE_ROLL)) %>%
  ungroup()
```

```{r fig-correlation-monthly, fig.height=12, warning=FALSE, progress=FALSE, include=TRUE, fig.cap="Correlation between different monthly drought parameters.", internal = TRUE}
pairs_drought_monthly <- drought_monthly %>%
  filter(year > 2020) %>% 
  select(-c(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_WGS_x_corrected, year, month, date, DATE))
                                                    
ggpairs(pairs_drought_monthly, showStrips=TRUE, progress=FALSE)+

```

```{r fig-correlation-daily, fig.height=10, warning=FALSE, progress=FALSE, include=TRUE, fig.cap="Correlation between different daily drought parameters from 2021 to present.", eval=FALSE, internal = TRUE}
pairs_drought_daily <- drought_daily %>%
  filter(year > 2021) %>% # filter to reduce coputation time
  select(-c(SAMPLE_CODE, TREE_WGS_x_corrected, date, year, month, day, METEO_ID, SPECIES_SHORT, DATE_NUMBER))

ggpairs(pairs_drought_daily, showStrips=TRUE, progress=FALSE)+
  theme_report(angle=90)
```

```{r save-output}
saveRDS(drought_monthly %>% select(SAMPLE_CODE, year, month, PET_HARG, CLIM_BALANCE1, CLIM_BALANCE3, CLIM_BALANCE6, CLIM_BALANCE12) %>% mutate(month=as.numeric(month)) %>% ungroup(), paste0(path_own_data, "/input_drought.rds"))
saveRDS(drought_daily %>% select(SAMPLE_CODE, year, month, day, date, DATE_NUMBER, contains("CLIM_BALANCE"), -CLIM_BALANCE) %>% ungroup(), paste0(path_own_data, "/input_drought_daily.rds"))
